name: The Adventurous King
description:
Ruling the country is boring... the King wants to go on an adventure!

The Adventurous King is a strategic puzzle adventure game. Hire adventurers at the campsite, find loot and fight monsters!

This game is created for Ludum Dare 45, which theme was "start with nothing".  It's my 2nd attempt at Ludum Dare and my first jam ever using Godot. I'm still learning, didn't have time to figure out how to implement audio. The graphics are hand drawn and digitally coloured.
